Title: Prohibits corporate entities, developers, and contractors from converting single-family homes into a rental property unit
Summary: Prohibits corporate entity, real estate developer, or residential building contractor from directly or indirectly purchasing, owning, building, acquiring, or otherwise obtaining any interest in any single-family private dwelling and converting such property into residential real estate containing one rental unit.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to prohibiting corporate entities, developers, and contractors from converting single-family homes into a rental property unit
